title.narrative: 2020 SY4015 & SY4018 * Dutch Relief Alliance Syria Joint Response (SYJR6 & SYJR7)

description.narrative: This project is a continued collaboration between International NGO's and local partners to address the need of vulnerable and affected people in Syria.

participating-org.narrative: Partner 11. Exclusion policy: Due to security reasons no further details can be provided.
